document.full_text: pfizer inc has agreed to suspend u.s. sales of a popular poultry drug after a study found the drug increased levels of a carcinogen in chickens, u.s. health officials said on wednesday.
document.title: pfizer will suspend u.s. sales of poultry drug
lines_and_colors: pfizer inc has agreed to suspend u.s. sales of a popular poultry drug after a study found the drug increased levels of a carcinogen in chickens, u.s. health officials said on wednesday.
